Tool

NameUpslope and Downslope Curvature
ID26
AuthorP.Gandelli, O.Conrad (c) 2015
Specificationgrid

Description

Calculates the local curvature of a cell as sum of the gradients to its neighbour cells. Upslope curvature is the distance weighted average local curvature in a cell's upslope contributing area based on multiple flow direction after Freeman 1994. References: - Freeman, G.T. (1991): Calculating catchment area with divergent flow based on a regular grid. Computers and Geosciences, 17:413-22
